mapper.update: update party set party_name=#{party_name} ,party_master=#{party_master} where party_id=#{party_id}
mapper.select: select rnum,party_id,party_name,party_master from (select row_number() over(order by num desc) as rnum,party_id,party_name,party_master from party where #{searchKey} like #{searchWord}) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) total_rows from party where #{searchKey} like #{searchWord}
